body.name: VIZIO 55-Inch M-Series 4K QLED HDR Smart TV with Voice Remote, Dolby Vision, HDR10+, Alexa Compatibility, VRR with AMD FreeSync, M55Q6-J01, 2021 Model (Renewed)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 36 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: 4K Ultra HD - Over 8 million pixels for breathtaking detail. 4 times the resolution of 1080p!

Dolby Vision HDR - See it the way the director intended. Dolby Vision transforms your TV experience with incredible brightness, contrast, and color that brings entertainment to life like never before. M-series also supports HDR10, HDR10+ and HLG.
Quantum Color - Next-generation QLED delivers cinematic color with over a billion hues of vibrant color.
Full Array Backlight - Evenly distributed LEDs across the screen's backlight deliver superior light uniformity and picture performance.
IQ Active Processor - Delivers superior picture processing, and a powerful and intelligent 4K upscaling engine that makes your favorite HD entertainment look spectacular in 4K.
body.description: This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I think vizio is the best tv out there. I bought a new 55" to replace my old one that finally died, hung it on the wall, turned it on and in the bottom left corner it had a bad spot. Will be returning it after the first of the year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Two out of Two TVs- Broken. Strike two, I'm out.
reviews.reviewText: After two attempts, I do not recommend buying a renewed model. While I think I'd really like the TV, I'm now returning the second one-Strike one: The screen had vertical and horizontal lines from the first time I turned it on.Strike two: The box and styrofoam protection inside the box were damaged, and the TV was cracked.The price is good. The TV is great if it works, but. . . I will not bat a third time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Missing of AAA batteries for remote control for smart TV vizio

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Will never buy a Vizio TV again
reviews.reviewText: First mistake, it was refurbished. The box was huge and torn and difficult to maneuver by myself. Once I finally got the TV out of the broken box and unwrapped there would absolutely have been no way I could have repacked it by myself to return it. The exterior is in perfect condition but whoever originally purchased this TV stripped the screw holes for the legs so it's only resting its legs but not screwed in tight. I had the entire set up and unwrapped before I discovered the stripped screws. It looked like the same screws had been re-bagged and tapped shut. The digital picture is only fair and not very sharp. The Sony flat screen I gave away because it was 15 years old had a far better picture. BUT... in all fairness this Vizio WAS refurbished... and I could have returned it... it was just too much to handle alone. But the worst part about this TV is that when you record a show and play it back the commercials re-play at such a high decibel you can literally hear them blaring from the unit next door no matter how low the volume is set. I hate this TV. Can't wait to replace it. And it wasn't even good value for a refurbished TV. I was just tired from moving and wanted a TV quickly. Never again will buy a Vizio OR any refurbished TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price
